title: Received A Gift Notification, No Gift Reveal
body:
Logged into alpha client, notification for "You received a gift" but when I clicked on it it just disappeared and didn't show me what the gift was.

How can I see the history of what I have been gifted and by who?

Or do I have to go through every champ and ward skin to see if there is something I didn't have before?

Cheers for any help.

replies.body: Gifting notifications have been enabled in the updated client. However, this is the first time this feature has been turned on and you may see notifications for the gifts you have received in the past. This will only happen on your first login.
Oh cheers for the info, I went through skins and found one I'm not sure if I had before or not. Hopefully it is old lol.
If you click on the little bell icon it'll show you what the gifts actually were. More than likely they are old icon gifts because of what Rineyy said.
